short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to use FateCharacterSheet.com along with Roll20 for Fate-based roll20 Campaigns

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to use your character sheets and adversaries with Roll20. Buttons will show up on your sheets that you can click to send your aspects and stunts and you can roll your skills and approaches directly to your Roll20 session.
